title: Loggin problem
body: So my problem is kinda hard to understand . I was in champ select with my friend but my game froze and I decided that i'm gonna restart the game before the match. But when i tryed to log in the client sayed that my password is not correct . Then i tryed to log in , in the website and it would not let me again aswell , but the web site let's me in after 4-5-6 tries with the same password . My Qestion is , how those it happen and how to fix it ?

replies.body: Hmmmm if you were kicked out of that match and then your password wouldn't work anymore, there's a chance that someone hacked your account and changed your password O_O! Reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) choosing "I need help recovering my account" just to be safe!
